ghostPost.title: Every Marketing Sales Play That Exists (For Now...Maybe)
ghostPost.excerpt:
I can’t stand the trend that hit the marketing industry right around the time
the time the internet burst into the world. Marketers started seeing themselves
as gurus and hoarders of knowledge. When we started caring more about clicks and
CPAs then just being persuasive, we got lazy thinking we could shortcut the
system.  Enter the ”SME.” I loathe the elitist subject matter expert. You are
not the horcrux of business success, Mr. Subject Matter Expert.  Long live the
marketing generalist!

Angry
